name: Default
description: The default PiFire dashboard displays all food probes as gauges, includes a hopper card, status card and elapsed time card.
author: Ben Parmeter

config.name: max_primary_temp_F
config.friendly_name: Max Primary Probe Display Temp F
config.description: This is the maximum primary probe (grill probe) display temperature (F). The primary gauge will max out at this temperature.

config.name: max_food_temp_F
config.friendly_name: Max Food Probe Display Temp F
config.description: This is the maximum food probe display temperature (F). The food gauges will max out at this temperature.

config.name: max_primary_temp_C
config.friendly_name: Max Primary Probe Display Temp C
config.description: This is the maximum primary probe (grill probe) display temperature (C). The primary gauge will max out at this temperature.

config.name: max_food_temp_C
config.friendly_name: Max Food Probe Display Temp C
config.description: This is the maximum food probe display temperature (C). The food gauges will max out at this temperature.

config.name: touch_screen_mode
config.description: Changes some visual elements to be more compatible with a touch screen display.
